trans-unit.source: Sequence tables can also be useful in date calculations. For example, to find the day of the week that a particular date has fallen on over a 40 year period (perhaps for birthday planning ahead!):
trans-unit.target: 序列表在日期计算中也很有用。例如,找出40年内某一特定日期在一周中的哪一天(也许是为了提前规划生日!)。

trans-unit.source: Sequence tables, while virtual, are still tables, so they must be in a database. This means that a default database must be selected (for example, via the USE command) to be able to query a Sequence table. The information_schema database cannot be used as the default for a Sequence table.
trans-unit.target: 序列表虽然是虚拟的，但仍然是表，因此它们必须在数据库中。这意味着必须选择默认数据库（例如，通过USE命令）才能查询序列表。该INFORMATION_SCHEMA数据库不能用作默认的序列表。

trans-unit.source: Set
trans-unit.target: Set

trans-unit.source: Set innodb_fast_shutdown to 0. This is to ensure that if you make a backup as part of the upgrade, all data is written to the InnoDB data files, which simplifies any restore in the future.
trans-unit.target: 将innodb_fast_shutdown设置为 0 。这是为了确保在升级过程中进行备份时，所有数据都将写入InnoDB数据文件中，从而简化了以后的任何还原操作。

trans-unit.source: Set gtid_domain_id to a value that is different than the wsrep_gtid_domain_id and gtid_domain_id values that the cluster nodes are using.
trans-unit.target: 将 gtid_domain_id 设置为与集群节点使用的 wsrep_gtid_domain_id 和 gtid_domain_id 值不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Set log_bin and log_slave_updates=ON if you want the slave to log the transactions that it replicates.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望从服务器记录其复制的事务，请设置 log_bin 和 log_slave_updates=ON 。

trans-unit.source: Set log_slave_updates=ON on all nodes in both clusters. See Configuring MariaDB Galera Cluster: Writing Replicated Write Sets to the Binary Log and Using MariaDB Replication with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Configuring a Cluster Node as a Replication Master for more information on why this is important. This is also needed to enable wsrep GTID mode.
trans-unit.target: 在两个集群中的所有节点上都将 log_slave_updates=ON 设置为ON。请参阅配置MariaDB Galera群集：将复制的写集写入二进制日志，以及将MariaDB复制与MariaDB Galera群集：将群集节点配置为复制主服务器，以获取有关为什么这很重要的更多信息。启用wsrep GTID模式也需要此设置。

trans-unit.source: Set log_slave_updates=ON on all nodes in the cluster. See Configuring MariaDB Galera Cluster: Writing Replicated Write Sets to the Binary Log and Using MariaDB Replication with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Configuring a Cluster Node as a Replication Master for more information on why this is important. This is also needed to enable wsrep GTID mode.
trans-unit.target: 在集群中的所有节点 log_slave_updates=ON 设置为ON。请参阅配置MariaDB Galera群集：将复制的写集写入二进制日志，以及将MariaDB复制与MariaDB Galera群集：将群集节点配置为复制主服务器，以获取有关为什么这很重要的更多信息。启用wsrep GTID模式也需要此设置。

trans-unit.source: Set server_id to a different value than the one that the cluster nodes are using.
trans-unit.target: 将 server_id 设置为与集群节点正在使用的值不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Set server_id to the same value on all nodes in a given cluster, but be sure to use a different value in each cluster. See Using MariaDB Replication with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Setting server_id on Cluster Nodes for more information on what this means.
trans-unit.target: 在给定集群中的所有节点上，将 server_id 设置为相同的值，但请确保在每个集群中使用不同的值。有关这意味着什么的更多信息，请参见将MariaDB复制与MariaDB Galera群集一起使用：在群集节点上设置server_id。

trans-unit.source: Set server_id to the same value on all nodes in the cluster. See Using MariaDB Replication with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Setting server_id on Cluster Nodes for more information on what this means.
trans-unit.target: 在集群中的所有节点上将 server_id 设置为相同的值。有关这意味着什么的更多信息，请参见将MariaDB复制与MariaDB Galera群集一起使用：在群集节点上设置server_id。

trans-unit.source: Set the default character set to name. If no character set is specified, until MariaDB 10.3.11, mysqldump uses utf8, and from MariaDB 10.3.11, uses utf8mb4.
trans-unit.target: 将默认字符集设置为name。如果未指定任何字符集，则在MariaDB 10.3.11之前，mysqldump使用utf8，而从MariaDB 10.3.11开始，使用utf8mb4。

trans-unit.source: Set the default character set.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认字符集。

trans-unit.source: Set the default character set. A common issue that can occur when the operating system uses utf8 or another multibyte character set is that output from the mysql client is formatted incorrectly, due to the fact that the MariaDB client uses the latin1 character set by default. You can usually fix such issues by using this option to force the client to use the system character set instead. If set to auto the character set is taken from the client environment (LC_CTYPE on Unix).
trans-unit.target: 设置默认字符集。当操作系统使用utf8或另一个多字节字符集时，可能会发生的一个常见问题是，由于MariaDB客户端默认情况下使用latin1字符集，因此mysql客户端的输出格式不正确。通常，您可以通过使用此选项强制客户端使用系统字符集来解决此类问题。如果设置为 auto 则字符集取自客户端环境（Unix上为 LC_CTYPE ）。

trans-unit.target: 设置默认字符集。

trans-unit.source: Setting thread_pool_dedicated_listener will give each group its own dedicated listener, and the listener thread will not pick up work items. As a result, the actual queue size in the table will be more exact, since IO requests are immediately dequeued from poll, without delay.
trans-unit.target: 设置thread_pool_dedicated_listener将为每个组提供自己的专用侦听器，并且该侦听器线程将不会拾取工作项。结果，表中的实际队列大小将更加准确，因为IO请求会立即从轮询中出队，而不会产生延迟。

trans-unit.source: Setting thread_pool_dedicated_listener will give each group its own dedicated listener, and the listener thread will not pick up work items. As a result, the queueing time in the table will be more exact, since IO requests are immediately dequeued from poll, without delay.
trans-unit.target: 设置thread_pool_dedicated_listener将为每个组提供自己的专用侦听器，并且该侦听器线程将不会拾取工作项。结果，表中的排队时间将更加准确，因为IO请求会立即从轮询中取消排队，而不会产生延迟。

trans-unit.source: Setting thread_poll_exact_stats will provides better queueing time statistics by using a high precision timestamp, at a small performance cost, for the time when the connection was added to the queue. This timestamp helps calculate the queuing time shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: 设置thread_poll_exact_stats将在连接添加到队列时使用高精度时间戳以较低的性能代价提供更好的排队时间统计信息。该时间戳有助于计算表中所示的排队时间。

trans-unit.source: Shard builds via replication into Spider tables is interesting when you can route READS to a pool of Spider nodes reattaching the shards.

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query
trans-unit.target: Shard-Query

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query automatically rewrites queries so that they return proper results when the query is executed over multiple shards. For example, when the COUNT aggregate function is used, it is executed as the SUM of the COUNT from each of the queried shards. Shard-Query elects a 'coordinator node' for each SELECT query, which is used for aggregating the results.
trans-unit.target: 分片查询会自动重写查询，以便在多个分片上执行查询时它们返回正确的结果。例如，当 COUNT 使用聚集函数，其被作为执行 SUM 的的 COUNT 从每个所查询的碎片。分片查询为每个 SELECT 查询选择一个“协调器节点”，用于汇总结果。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query behaves like READ-COMMITTED in terms of transaction isolation for a single query. Shard-Query works best with a star schema data set, and is therefore targeted towards large data marts. Shard-Query also works well with extremely large tables, such as machine generated logs or sensor data.
trans-unit.target: 就单个查询的事务隔离而言，分片查询的行为类似于 READ-COMMITTED 。碎片查询最适合星型模式数据集，因此主要针对大型数据集市。Shard-Query也适用于非常大的表，例如机器生成的日志或传感器数据。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query includes
trans-unit.target: Shard-查询包括

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query is a high performance MPP (massively parallel processing) query engine for MariaDB and MySQL which offers increased parallelism compared to stand-alone servers. This increased parallelism is achieved by taking advantage of MariaDB/MySQL partitioning, sharding, common query clauses like BETWEEN and IN, or some combination of the above.
trans-unit.target: Shard-Query是一个针对MariaDB和MySQL的高性能MPP(大规模并行处理)查询引擎,与独立服务器相比,它提供了更高的并行性。这种提高的并行性是通过利用MariaDB/MySQL的分区、sharding、常见的查询子句(如BETWEEN和IN)或上述的一些组合来实现的。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query is designed to work with a sharded data set. Shard-Query is designed to make a group of shards behave as one virtual database server, even for complex queries. Shard-Query includes two shard "mappers", described below.
trans-unit.target: 分片查询旨在与分片数据集一起使用。分片查询旨在使一组分片表现为一个虚拟数据库服务器，即使对于复杂的查询也是如此。分片查询包括两个分片“映射器”，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query is designed to work with a sharded data set. Shard-Query is designed to make a group of shards behave as one virtual database server, even for complex queries. Shard-Query includes two shard "mappers", described below.
trans-unit.target: 分片查询旨在与分片数据集一起使用。分片查询旨在使一组分片充当一个虚拟数据库服务器，即使对于复杂的查询也是如此。分片查询包括两个分片“映射器”，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query is implemented with PHP and Gearman.
trans-unit.target: Shard-Query是用PHP和Gearman实现的。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query is targeted mainly at big data problems, and OLAP queries in general. The primary goal of Shard-Query is to enable low-latency query access to extremely large volumes of data utilizing commodity hardware and open source database software. Shard-Query is a federated query engine which is designed to perform as much work in parallel as possible over a sharded dataset, that is one that is split over multiple servers (shards) or partitioned tables.
trans-unit.target: Shard-Query主要针对大数据问题,以及一般的OLAP查询。Shard-Query的主要目标是利用商品硬件和开源数据库软件,实现对极大量数据的低延迟查询访问。Shard-Query是一个联合查询引擎,它被设计为在一个分片数据集上尽可能多地并行执行工作,也就是在多个服务器(分片)或分区表上分割的数据集。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query resources
trans-unit.target: Shard-查询资源

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query supports both sharded and un-sharded tables. Un-sharded tables are tables which do not contain the shard column. Insertions into un-sharded tables go to all shards. If a query contains no sharded tables, then the query is sent to only a single shard to prevent duplication of data.
trans-unit.target: Shard-Query支持sharded和un-sharded表。非碎片表是不包含碎片列的表。在非碎片表中的插入将被发送到所有的碎片。如果一个查询不包含sharded表,那么查询只发送到一个单一shard,以防止数据重复。

trans-unit.source: Shard-Query uses one of the above mappers in order to determine to which shards a query should be sent based on the WHERE clause used in the query. It may be possible to reduce the number of shards to which to send a query when the WHERE clause includes a condition on the shard column.
trans-unit.target: 分片查询使用上述映射器之一，以便根据查询中使用的 WHERE 子句确定将查询发送到哪个分片。当 WHERE 子句在分片列上包含条件时，可以减少向其发送查询的分片数量。

trans-unit.source: Signal the storage engine that it should expect that a lot of rows are deleted. The storage engine engine can do things to speed up the DELETE like ignoring merging of data blocks until all rows are deleted from the block (instead of when a block is half full). This speeds up things at the expanse of lost space in data blocks. At least MyISAM and Aria support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 向存储引擎发出信号，告知它应该删除很多行。存储引擎引擎可以执行一些操作来加快DELETE的速度，例如忽略数据块的合并，直到从该块中删除所有行为止（而不是当一个块半满时）。这样可以在数据块中失去空间的情况下加快处理速度。至少MyISAM和Aria支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Similar to built in functions, the SDK supports distributed aggregate execution where as much of the calculation is scaled out across PM nodes and then collected / finalized in the UM node. Window functions (due to the ordering requirement) are only executed at the UM level.
trans-unit.target: 与内置函数类似,SDK支持分布式聚合执行,其中尽可能多的计算是在PM节点上进行的,然后在UM节点上收集/最终完成。窗口函数(由于排序要求)只在UM级执行。

trans-unit.source: Similar to cpimport, mcsimport accepts as input any flat file that contains a delimiter between fields of data (i.e. columns in a table). The default delimiter is a comma (‘,’), but other delimiters such as pipes may also be used. By default mcsimport expects the data values to be in the same order as the create table statement, and a date format of ‘YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS’. But, these settings can be overwritten in a mapping file which allows customizeable input column to ColumnStore column mappings, the usage of individual input column specific date formats utilizing the strptime format, and the specification of default values for non mapped target columns.
trans-unit.target: 与cpimport相似，mcsimport接受包含数据字段（即表中的列）之间的定界符的任何平面文件作为输入。默认的分隔符是逗号（' ， '），但是也可以使用其他分隔符，例如管道。默认情况下，mcsimport期望数据值与create table语句的顺序相同，并且日期格式为YYYY-MM-DD HH：MM：SS。但是，可以在映射文件中覆盖这些设置，该文件允许自定义输入列到ColumnStore列的映射，使用strptime格式的各个输入列特定日期格式的使用以及未映射目标列的默认值的规范。

trans-unit.source: Similar to cpimport, mcsimport accepts as input any flat file that contains a delimiter between fields of data (i.e. columns in a table). The default delimiter is a comma (‘,’), but other delimiters such as pipes may also be used. By default mcsimport expects the data values to be in the same order as the create table statement, and a date format of ‘YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS’. But, these settings can be overwritten in a mapping file which allows customizeable input column to ColumnStore column mappings, the usage of individual input column specific date formats utilizing the strptime format, and the specification of default values for non mapped target columns.
trans-unit.target: 与cpimport相似，mcsimport接受包含数据字段（即表中的列）之间的定界符的任何平面文件作为输入。默认定界符是逗号（' ， '），但也可以使用其他定界符，例如管道。默认情况下，mcsimport期望数据值与create table语句的顺序相同，并且日期格式为' YYYY-MM-DD HH：MM：SS '。但是，可以在映射文件中覆盖这些设置，该文件允许自定义输入列到ColumnStore列的映射，使用strptime格式的各个输入列特定日期格式的使用以及非映射目标列的默认值的规范。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the ANALYZE TABLE statement, SHOW TABLE STATUS statements do not provide accurate statistics for InnoDB, except for the physical table size.
trans-unit.target: 与ANALYZE TABLE语句类似，SHOW TABLE STATUS语句除了物理表大小以外，不提供InnoDB的准确统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the parameters of LIMIT, rows_limit can be both a prepared statement parameter, or a stored program parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 LIMIT 的参数类似， rows_limit 可以是准备好的语句参数，也可以是存储的程序参数。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the shared and exclusive intention locks described above, there can be a number of types of gap locks. These include the shared gap lock, exclusive gap lock, intention shared gap lock and intention exclusive gap lock.
trans-unit.target: 与上述共享和专属意向锁类似,缺口锁也可以有多种类型。其中包括共享间隙锁、专属间隙锁、意向共享间隙锁和意向专属间隙锁。

trans-unit.source: Similarities
trans-unit.target: Similarities

trans-unit.source: Similarly the AWS cli utility can be utilized to read data from an s3 bucket and pipe the output into cpimport allowing direct loading from S3. This assumes the aws cli program has been installed and configured on the host:
trans-unit.target: 同样,AWS cli实用程序也可以用来从s3 bucket中读取数据,并将输出结果导入cpimport,从而实现从S3直接加载。假设主机上已经安装并配置了aws cli程序。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to scalar functions ColumnStore distributes aggregate evaluation as much as possible. However some post processing is required to combine the final results in the UM. Enough memory must exist on both the PM and UM to handle queries where there are a very large number of values in the aggregate column(s).
trans-unit.target: 与标量函数ColumnStore类似,ColumnStore也尽可能地分配了集合评估。然而,在UM中需要进行一些后处理来合并最终结果。PM和UM上必须有足够的内存来处理聚合列中有大量值的查询。

trans-unit.source: Similarly to the XCOL table type, OCCUR is an extension to the PROXY type when referring to a table or view having several columns containing the same kind of data. It enables having a different view of the table where the data from these columns are put in a single column, eventually causing several rows to be generated from one row of the object table. For example, supposing we have a pets table:
trans-unit.target: 与 XCOL 表类型类似，当引用具有包含相同数据类型的几列的表或视图时， OCCUR 是 PROXY 类型的扩展。它使得能够具有表的不同视图，其中来自这些列的数据被放在单个列中，最终导致从对象表的一行生成几行。例如，假设我们有一个宠物表：

trans-unit.source: Similarly, “server_two” and “server_three” would be created and the final partition table would be created as:
trans-unit.target: 同样，将创建“ server_two”和“ server_three”，并将最终分区表创建为：

trans-unit.source: Similarly, --binlog-do-db=database_name also behaves differently depending on whether statement-based or row-based logging is used.
trans-unit.target: 同样， --binlog-do-db=database_name 行为也有所不同，具体取决于使用的是基于语句的日志记录还是基于行的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, an attempt to manually binlog a GTID with a lower sequence number (by setting @@SESSION.gtid_seq_no) is rejected with an error.
trans-unit.target: 类似地，尝试以较低的序号手动设置GTID的尝试（通过设置 @@SESSION.gtid_seq_no ）会失败，并显示错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a NULL value is assigned to a TIMESTAMP field, the current date and time is assigned instead.
trans-unit.target: 同样,如果给TIMESTAMP字段分配了一个NULL值,就会分配当前的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, in a multi-master ring topology, where all master in the ring are updated by the application concurrently (with some mechanism to avoid conflicts), a distinct domain ID should be configured for each server (In a multi-master ring where the application is careful to only do updates on one master at a time, a single domain ID is sufficient).
trans-unit.target: 同样,在多主环拓扑中,环中的所有主站都被应用同时更新(有一些避免冲突的机制),应该为每台服务器配置一个不同的域ID(在多主环中,应用小心翼翼地一次只对一个主站进行更新,一个域ID即可)。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, one can rotate partitions by time:
trans-unit.target: 同样,也可以按时间旋转分区。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, system versioning can be removed from a table:
trans-unit.target: 同样,系统版本也可以从表中删除。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the collation_server variable is used for setting the default server collation.
trans-unit.target: 同样，collat​​ion_server变量用于设置默认服务器排序规则。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when an event is logged in its row-based format, many replication filters that affect a table will test the filter against the table in the the database that is actually affected by the event.
trans-unit.target: 同样,当一个事件以其基于行的格式被记录时,许多影响表的复制过滤器会根据实际受事件影响的数据库中的表来测试过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when using file-per-table tablespaces and using ALTER TABLE to manually set the ENCRYPTED table option to NO, InnoDB does not use background threads to decrypt the tablespaces.
trans-unit.target: 类似地，当使用文件每次表的表空间和使用 ALTER TABLE 手动设置 ENCRYPTED 表选项 NO 时，InnoDB不会不使用后台线程来解密表空间。

trans-unit.target: 简单断言

trans-unit.target: 简单功能

trans-unit.target: 简单的INSERT语句

trans-unit.target: 简单的REPLACE语句

trans-unit.target: 简单的投。

trans-unit.source: Simple external monitoring script
trans-unit.target: 简单的外部监控脚本

trans-unit.source: Simple replication setups only have a single master being updated by the application at any one time. In such setups, there is only a single replication stream needed. Then domain ID can be ignored, and left as the default of 0 on all servers.
trans-unit.target: 简单的复制设置在任何时候都只有一个主站被应用程序更新。在这种设置中,只需要一个复制流。那么域ID可以忽略,在所有服务器上都留为默认的0。

trans-unit.source: Simplified Editing: Easy to add and remove connections.
trans-unit.target: 简化编辑。轻松添加和删除连接。

trans-unit.source: Simply adding more memory may not result in drastic improvements if the server variables are not set to make use of the extra available memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器变量没有被设置为使用额外的可用内存,那么仅仅增加更多的内存可能不会带来巨大的改善。

trans-unit.source: Simply draw query on the visual diagram and execute it.
trans-unit.target: 只需在可视化图表上绘制查询并执行即可。

trans-unit.source: Simply put, a character set defines how and which characters are stored to support a particular language or languages. A collation, on the other hand, defines the order used when comparing strings (i.e. the position of any given character within the alphabet of that language)
trans-unit.target: 简单地说,字符集定义了如何以及哪些字符被存储以支持特定的语言或语言。另一方面,整理定义了比较字符串时使用的顺序(即任何给定字符在该语言字母表中的位置)。

trans-unit.source: Simply, PROXY being the default type when TABNAME is specified:
trans-unit.target: 简单来说，当指定 TABNAME 时， PROXY 是默认类型：

trans-unit.source: Since 'Once' is a stopword, no result is returned:
trans-unit.target: 由于'Once'是停用词，因此不会返回任何结果：

trans-unit.source: Since Percona XtraBackup is a third party product, it may require additional installation and additional configuration. Please refer to Percona's xtrabackup SST documentation for information from the vendor.
trans-unit.target: 由于Percona XtraBackup是第三方产品，因此可能需要其他安装和配置。请参阅Percona的xtrabackup SST文档以获取供应商的信息。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0, SHOW EXPLAIN shows the output of a running statement. In some cases, its output can be closer to reality than EXPLAIN.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0开始， SHOW EXPLAIN 显示正在运行的语句的输出。在某些情况下，其输出可能比 EXPLAIN 更接近实际。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0, InnoDB can dump the buffer pool before the server shuts down, and restore it when it starts again. If this feature is used, no warmup is necessary. To enable the buffer pool dump at shutdown and the restore at startup respectively, the innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown and innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup system variables can be set to ON.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0开始，InnoDB可以在服务器关闭之前转储缓冲池，并在再次启动时将其还原。如果使用此功能，则无需预热。要分别在关闭时启用缓冲池转储和在启动时启用还原，可以将innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown和innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup系统变量设置为ON。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0, for DML statements, it is possible to specify a list of the partitions using the PARTITION clause. See Partition Pruning and Selection for details.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0开始，对于DML语句，可以使用PARTITION子句指定分区列表。有关详细信息，请参见分区修剪和选择。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0, it is also possible to explicitly dump the buffer pool on disk before starting a logical backup, and restore it after the process. This will undo any negative change to the buffer pool which happens during the backup. To dump the buffer pool, the innodb_buffer_pool_dump_now system variable can be set to ON. To restore it, the innodb_buffer_pool_load_now system variable can be set to ON.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0开始，还可以在开始逻辑备份之前将缓冲池显式转储到磁盘上，并在此过程之后将其还原。这将撤消备份期间对缓冲池的任何负面更改。要转储缓冲池，可以将innodb_buffer_pool_dump_now系统变量设置为ON。要还原它，可以将innodb_buffer_pool_load_now系统变量设置为ON。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0, the CONNECT storage engine also allows access to a remote database via MySQL or ODBC connection (table types: MYSQL, ODBC). However, in the current implementation there are several limitations.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0开始，CONNECT存储引擎还允许通过MySQL或ODBC连接（表类型：MYSQL，ODBC）访问远程数据库。但是，在当前的实现中，存在一些限制。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.1, Galera has been a standard part of MariaDB Server.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1开始，Galera成为MariaDB Server的标准部分。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.1, the ANALYZE statement runs a statement and returns information about its execution plan. It also shows additional columns, to check how much the optimizer's estimation about filtering and found rows are close to reality.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1开始，ANALYZE语句运行一条语句并返回有关其执行计划的信息。它还显示其他列，以检查优化器对过滤和找到的行的估计是否接近实际。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.1, the MySQL-wsrep patch has been merged into MariaDB Server. Therefore, in MariaDB 10.1 and above, the functionality of MariaDB Galera Cluster can be obtained by installing the standard MariaDB Server packages and the Galera wsrep provider library package.
trans-unit.target: 自MariaDB 10.1起，MySQL-wsrep补丁已合并到MariaDB Server中。因此，在MariaDB 10.1和更高版本中，可以通过安装标准MariaDB Server软件包和Galera wsrep提供程序库软件包来获得MariaDB Galera Cluster的功能。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.1, the character_set_filesystem system variable has controlled interpretation of file names that are given as literal strings.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.1开始，character_set_filesystem系统变量已控制对以文字字符串形式给出的文件名的解释。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.1, the character_set_filesystem system variable has controlled interpretation of file names that are given as literal strings. This affects the following statements and functions:
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.1开始，character_set_filesystem系统变量已控制对以文字字符串形式给出的文件名的解释。这会影响以下语句和功能：

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.2, a storage engine can allow the user to specify additional attributes per index, field, or table. The engine needs to declare what attributes it introduces.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.2开始，存储引擎可以允许用户为每个索引，字段或表指定其他属性。引擎需要声明其引入的属性。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.2, the Aria storage engine has included a feature to group commits to speed up concurrent threads doing many inserts into the same or different Aria tables.
trans-unit.target: 自MariaDB 5.2以来，Aria存储引擎已包含一项功能，可对提交进行分组，以加速并发线程在同一或不同Aria表中进行多次插入的速度。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.3, the Aria storage engine supports progress reporting for this statement.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.3开始，Aria存储引擎支持此语句的进度报告。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.3, the LOAD DATA INFILE statement supports progress reporting. You may find this useful when dealing with long-running operations. Using another client you can issue a SHOW PROCESSLIST query to check the progress of the data load.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.3开始， LOAD DATA INFILE 语句支持进度报告。在处理长时间运行的操作时，您可能会发现这很有用。使用另一个客户端，您可以发出 SHOW PROCESSLIST 查询来检查数据加载的进度。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.5, the PBXT storage engine has been disabled by default and must be explicitly built to use it. The reason is that PBXT is not actively maintained anymore. It has a few bugs that are not fixed and it's not actively used.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.5开始，默认情况下已禁用PBXT存储引擎，必须显式构建 PBXT存储引擎才能使用它。原因是PBXT不再被主动维护。它具有一些未修复的错误，并且未被积极使用。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.1, DATETIME columns also accept CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as the default value.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.1开始，DATETIME列还接受CURRENT_TIMESTAMP作为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.1, this function returns a comma-separated list of column names. The names are quoted with backticks.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.1开始，此函数返回以逗号分隔的列名列表。名称用反引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.11, LIMIT 0 has been an exception to this rule (see MDEV-6170).
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.11开始， LIMIT 0 已成为该规则的例外（请参阅MDEV-6170）。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.12, the performance schema has been disabled by default for performance reasons. You can check its current status by looking at the value of the performance_schema system variable.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.12开始，由于性能原因，默认情况下已禁用性能模式。您可以通过查看 performance_schema 系统变量的值来检查其当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.22 and MariaDB 10.1.9, the table is upgraded live, and there is no need to restart the server if the table has changed.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.22和MariaDB 10.1.9开始，该表将实时升级，并且如果表已更改，则无需重新启动服务器。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.22, setting the event_scheduler system variable will also try to reload the mysql.event table if it was not properly loaded at startup.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.22开始，如果在启动时未正确加载mysql.event表，那么设置event_scheduler系统变量还将尝试重新加载mysql.event表。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.4, the CONDITION_PUSHDOWN argument is no longer accepted. However, it is not needed because CONNECT now uses condition pushdown unconditionally.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.4开始，不再接受CONDITION_PUSHDOWN参数。但是，由于CONNECT现在无条件使用条件下推，因此不需要。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.0.5, it has been possible to have EXPLAIN output printed in the slow query log. See EXPLAIN in the Slow Query Log for details.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.0.5开始，可以在慢速查询日志中打印 EXPLAIN 输出。有关详细信息，请参见慢速查询日志中的EXPLAIN。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.1.27, MariaDB 10.2.9 and MariaDB 10.3.2, temporary files created internally by InnoDB, such as those used for merge sorts and row logs can also be encrypted if innodb_encrypt_log=ON is set. These files are encrypted regardless of whether the tables involved are encrypted or not, and regardless of whether encrypt_tmp_files is set or not.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1.27，MariaDB 10.2.9和MariaDB 10.3.2开始，如果设置了innodb_encrypt_log = ON，则也可以对InnoDB内部创建的临时文件（例如用于合并排序和行日志的文件）进行加密。无论所涉及的表是否已加密，以及是否设置了crypto_tmp_files，这些文件都是经过加密的。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.1.7, MariaDB can also encrypt binary logs (including relay logs).
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1.7开始，MariaDB还可以加密二进制日志（包括中继日志）。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.1.7, MariaDB can also encrypt binary logs (including relay logs). Encryption of binary logs is configured by the encrypt_binlog system variable.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1.7开始，MariaDB还可以加密二进制日志（包括中继日志）。二进制日志的加密由 encrypt_binlog 系统变量配置。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.1.7, the column is converted to NOT NULL, but without a default value. If we then attempt to insert a record without explicitly setting c2, a warning (or, in strict mode, an error), will be thrown, for example:
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.1.7开始，该列将转换为NOT NULL，但没有默认值。如果我们随后尝试在未显式设置c2的情况下插入记录，则会引发警告（或在严格模式下为错误），例如：

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.2.1, it is possible to assign BLOB or TEXT columns a DEFAULT value. In earlier versions, assigning a default to these columns was not possible.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.2.1开始，可以为BLOB或TEXT列分配一个 DEFAULT 值。在早期版本中，无法为这些列分配默认值。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.2.2, LAST_VALUE can be used as a window function.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.2.2开始，LAST_VALUE可以用作窗口函数。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.2.2, the buffer pool can be set dynamically, and new variables are introduced that may affect the size and performance. See Setting Innodb Buffer Pool Size Dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.2.2开始，可以动态设置缓冲池，并引入可能影响大小和性能的新变量。请参阅动态设置Innodb缓冲池大小。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.2.4, by default both cases will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.2.4开始，默认情况下，这两种情况都会导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 10.4.7, MariaDB 10.3.17, MariaDB 10.2.26 and MariaDB 10.1.41, it requires the FILE privilege.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.4.7，MariaDB 10.3.17，MariaDB 10.2.26和MariaDB 10.1.41开始，它需要FILE特权。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.2.6, the Windows distribution includes tools that simplify migration between different versions and also allow migration between MySQL and MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.2.6开始，Windows发行版包含一些工具，这些工具可以简化不同版本之间的迁移，并且还允许在MySQL和MariaDB之间迁移。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.5.27, the comment before the tablenames (that /*COMMENT TO SAVE*/) is stored in the binary log. That feature can be used by replication tools to send their internal messages.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.5.27开始，表名之前的注释（ /*COMMENT TO SAVE*/ ）存储在二进制日志中。复制工具可以使用该功能来发送其内部消息。

trans-unit.source: Since SELECT * does not return the invisible columns, new tables or views created in this manner will have no trace of the invisible columns. If specifically referenced in the SELECT statement, the columns will be brought into the view/new table, but the INVISIBLE attribute will not.
trans-unit.target: 由于 SELECT * 不会返回不可见列，因此以这种方式创建的新表或视图将不会留下任何不可见列。如果在SELECT语句中专门引用，则这些列将被带到视图/新表中，但是INVISIBLE属性则不会。

trans-unit.source: Since SQL SECURITY defaults to DEFINER, whenever the user roger calls this function, the subselect will execute with your privileges. As long as you have privileges to select the salary of each employee, the caller of the function will be able to get the maximum salary for each department without being able to see individual salaries.
trans-unit.target: 由于 SQL SECURITY 默认为 DEFINER ，因此每当用户 roger 调用此函数时，子选择都将以您的特权执行。只要您有权选择每个员工的薪水，该函数的调用者就可以获取每个部门的最高薪水，而无需查看单个薪水。

trans-unit.source: Since mysql_install_db sets --auth-root-authentication-method=normal by default, the --auth-root-socket-user option is ignored by default.
trans-unit.target: 由于默认情况下 mysql_install_db 设置 --auth-root-authentication-method=normal ，因此默认情况下会忽略 --auth-root-socket-user 选项。

trans-unit.source: Since mysql_install_db sets --auth-root-authentication-method=socket by default, the following additional user accounts are not created by default:
trans-unit.target: 由于 mysql_install_db 默认情况下设置 --auth-root-authentication-method=socket ，因此默认情况下不会创建以下其他用户帐户：

trans-unit.source: Since A was never a slave before, it does not have any prior replicated GTIDs, and gtid_slave_pos will be empty. To allow A to be added as a slave automatically, master_use_gtid=current_pos can be used. This will connect using the value of the variable gtid_current_pos instead of gtid_slave_pos, which also takes into account GTIDs written into the binlog when the server was a master.
trans-unit.target: 由于A以前从未使用过从属，因此它以前没有任何复制的GTID，并且gtid_slave_pos将为空。为了允许将A自动添加为从站，可以使用 master_use_gtid=current_pos 。这将使用变量gtid_current_pos而不是gtid_slave_pos的值进行连接，该变量还考虑了当服务器是主服务器时写入binlog中的GTID。

trans-unit.source: Since CONNECT version 1.6, it is now possible to directly access MongoDB collections via their MongoDB C Driver. This is the purpose of the MONGO table type described later. However, JSON tables can also do it in a somewhat different way (providing MONGO support is installed as described for MONGO tables).
trans-unit.target: 自CONNECT 1.6版本以来,现在可以通过其MongoDB C驱动直接访问MongoDB集合。这就是后面介绍的MONGO表类型的目的。然而,JSON表也可以用某种不同的方式来实现(前提是按照MONGO表的描述安装了MONGO支持)。

trans-unit.source: Since ColumnStore only reads the necessary columns to resolve a query, only include the necessary columns required. For example select * will be significantly slower than select col1, col2 from table.
trans-unit.target: 由于ColumnStore只读取必要的列来解决查询,所以只包含所需的列。例如select *会比select col1,col2 from table要慢很多。

trans-unit.source: Since Germany has two big cities (in this diagram), it will be put into the query output twice. This is not correct, SELECT ... FROM Country should not produce the same country record twice. The FirstMatch strategy avoids the production of duplicates by short-cutting execution as soon as the first genuine match is found:
trans-unit.target: 由于德国有两个大城市（在此图中），它将两次放入查询输出中。这是不正确的， SELECT ... FROM Country 不应两次产生相同的国家记录。该 FirstMatch 作为第一个真正的找到匹配策略，避免了生产的短切执行重复尽快的：

trans-unit.source: Since MASTER_GTID_WAIT() looks only at the seq_no part of the GTIDs, not the server_id, care is needed if a slave becomes diverged from another server so that two different GTIDs with the same seq_no (in the same domain) arrive at the same server. This situation is in any case best avoided; setting gtid_strict_mode is recommended, as this will prevent any such out-of-order sequence numbers from ever being replicated on a slave.
trans-unit.target: 由于MASTER_GTID_WAIT（）仅查看GTID的seq_no部分，而不查看server_id，因此，如果从站与另一台服务器分离，则具有相同seq_no（在同一域中）的两个不同的GTID到达同一台服务器时，需要特别注意。无论如何，最好避免这种情况。建议设置gtid_strict_mode，因为这将防止任何此类乱序序列复制到从属服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB 5.3, the optimizer can create an index and use it for joins with other tables
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.3开始,优化器可以创建一个索引,并使用它与其他表进行连接。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB ColumnStore relies on a Syslog daemon, the container must start both ColumnStore and rsyslogd and the runit utility is used to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 由于MariaDB ColumnStore依赖于Syslog守护进程,容器必须同时启动ColumnStore和rsyslogd,并使用runit实用程序来实现这一点。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB and MySQL do not support GIS EMPTY values such as POINT EMPTY, as implemented it simply returns 1 if the geometry value g is invalid, 0 if it is valid, and NULL if the argument is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 由于MariaDB的和MySQL不支持GIS EMPTY值如点空的，因为实现了它简单地返回 1 ，如果几何值 g 是无效的， 0 ，如果它是有效的，并且 NULL 如果参数为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB's user and group mapping is performed by an external PAM module, MariaDB's pam authentication plugin does not support this syntax. Instead, the user and group mappings for the pam_user_map PAM module are configured in an external configuration file. This is discussed in a later section.
trans-unit.target: 由于MariaDB的用户和组映射是由外部PAM模块执行的，因此MariaDB的 pam 身份验证插件不支持此语法。而是在外部配置文件中配置 pam_user_map PAM模块的用户和组映射。这将在后面的部分中讨论。

trans-unit.source: Since MariaDB/MySQL 5.1.6, selects scan past BLOB columns unless they are specifically requested, making these queries much more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 自MariaDB/MySQL 5.1.6以来,除非特别要求,否则选择扫描过去的BLOB列,使这些查询的效率大大提高。

trans-unit.source: Since MaxScale routes the query as an analytical operation, the version_comment system variable indicates a ColumnStore server.
trans-unit.target: 由于MaxScale将查询作为分析操作进行路由，因此 version_comment 系统变量指示ColumnStore服务器。

trans-unit.source: Since MaxScale routes this query as a transactional operation, the version_comment system variable returns MariaDB Server.
trans-unit.target: 由于MaxScale将此查询作为事务操作进行路由，因此 version_comment 系统变量将返回MariaDB服务器。

trans-unit.source: Since RHEL 6.4, setting swappiness=0 more aggressively avoids swapping out, which increases the risk of OOM killing under strong memory and I/O pressure.
trans-unit.target: 从RHEL 6.4开始,设置swappiness=0可以更积极地避免交换,这增加了在强大的内存和I/O压力下的OOM杀伤风险。

trans-unit.source: Since a SEQUENCE caches values, it can sometimes be faster. Also, you can access the last value generated by all used sequences; it's not subjected to limitations of LAST_INSERT_ID( ).
trans-unit.target: 由于 SEQUENCE 缓存值，因此有时可能会更快。另外，您可以访问所有使用的序列生成的最后一个值；它不受LAST_INSERT_ID（）的限制。

trans-unit.source: Since core files are very large (1gb) and can take up a lot of disk space, Core File Generating for MariaDB ColumnStore platform processes is defaulted to disable.
trans-unit.target: 由于核心文件非常大(1gb),可能会占用大量的磁盘空间,所以MariaDB ColumnStore平台进程的核心文件生成默认为禁用。

trans-unit.source: Since fulltext re-organization can take a long time, the innodb_ft_num_word_optimize variable limits the re-organization to a number of words (2000 by default). You can run multiple OPTIMIZE statements to fully re-organize the index.
trans-unit.target: 由于全文重组可能需要很长时间，因此innodb_ft_num_word_optimize变量将重组限制为单词数（默认为2000）。您可以运行多个OPTIMIZE语句来完全重新组织索引。

trans-unit.source: Since identifiers are not permitted as prepared statements parameters, sometimes it is necessary to dynamically compose an SQL statement. This technique is called dynamic SQL). The following example shows how to use dynamic SQL:
trans-unit.target: 由于不允许将标识符用作准备好的语句参数，因此有时有必要动态组成SQL语句。这种技术称为动态SQL）。下面的示例演示如何使用动态SQL：

trans-unit.source: Since its inception, Innodb has had a mechanism to detect and ignore partial writes via the InnoDB Doublewrite Buffer (also innodb_checksum can be used to detect a partial write).
trans-unit.target: 自成立以来，Innodb就具有通过InnoDB Doublewrite缓冲区检测和忽略部分写入的机制（也可以使用innodb_checksum来检测部分写入）。

trans-unit.source: Since its use can be ambiguous, unlike the := assignment operator, the = assignment operator cannot be used in all contexts, and is only valid as part of a SET statement, or the SET clause of an UPDATE statement
trans-unit.target: 由于它的使用可能是模棱两可的，与：=赋值运算符不同， = 赋值运算符不能在所有上下文中使用，并且仅在SET语句或UPDATE语句的SET子句中有效

trans-unit.source: Since queries on this table are locking, if the performance_schema is enabled, you may want to query the THREADS table instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于对该表的查询处于锁定状态，因此如果启用了 performance_schema ,则可能要查询 THREADS 表。

trans-unit.source: Since replication is asynchronous, a Client (same or subsequent) cannot be guaranteed to see that data on the Slave. This is a "critical read". The async Replication delay forces apps to take some evasive action.
trans-unit.target: 由于复制是异步的,所以不能保证Client(相同或后续)在Slave上看到该数据。这就是 "临界读取"。异步复制的延迟迫使应用程序采取一些规避行动。

trans-unit.source: Since sequence objects act as regular tables in many contexts, they will be affected by LOCK TABLES. This is not the case in other DBMS, such as Oracle, where LOCK TABLE does not affect sequences.
trans-unit.target: 由于序列对象在许多情况下都充当常规表，因此它们将受到LOCK TABLES的影响。在其他DBMS（例如Oracle）中，情况并非如此，其中LOCK TABLE不会影响序列。

trans-unit.source: Since storage engines are plugins, different information about them is also shown in the information_schema.PLUGINS table and by the SHOW PLUGINS statement.
trans-unit.target: 由于存储引擎是插件，因此关于它们的不同信息也会在 information_schema.PLUGINS 表和 SHOW PLUGINS 语句中显示。

trans-unit.source: Since the Java version is a wrapper on top of the C++ API the underlying library must be loaded using a static initializer once in your program.
trans-unit.target: 由于Java版本是在C++API之上的一个包装器,所以必须在你的程序中使用静态初始化器加载底层库。

trans-unit.source: Since the current implementation of LOAD DATA FROM MASTER and LOAD TABLE FROM MASTER is very limited, these statements are deprecated in versions 4.1 of MySQL and above. We will introduce a more advanced technique (called "online backup") in a future version. That technique will have the additional advantage of working with more storage engines.
trans-unit.target: 由于 LOAD DATA FROM MASTER 和 LOAD TABLE FROM MASTER 的当前实现非常有限，因此在MySQL 4.1及更高版本中不赞成使用这些语句。在将来的版本中，我们将介绍一种更高级的技术（称为“在线备份”）。该技术将具有使用更多存储引擎的额外优势。

trans-unit.source: Since the current implementation of LOAD DATA FROM MASTER and LOAD TABLE FROM MASTER is very limited, these statements are deprecated in versions 4.1 of MySQL and above. We will introduce a more advanced technique (called "online backup") in a future version. That technique will have the additional advantage of working with more storage engines.
trans-unit.target: 由于 LOAD DATA FROM MASTER 和 LOAD TABLE FROM MASTER 的当前实现非常有限，因此在MySQL 4.1及更高版本中不赞成使用这些语句。在将来的版本中，我们将介绍一种更高级的技术（称为“在线备份”）。该技术将具有使用更多存储引擎的额外优势。

trans-unit.source: Since the data is stored in memory, it is highly vulnerable to power outages or hardware failure, and is unsuitable for permanent data storage. In fact, after a server restart, MEMORY tables will be recreated (because the definition file is stored on disk), but they will be empty. It is possible to re-populate them with a query using the --init-file server startup option.
trans-unit.target: 由于数据存储在内存中，因此极易受到断电或硬件故障的影响，因此不适合用于永久数据存储。实际上，在服务器重新启动后，将重新创建 MEMORY 表（因为定义文件存储在磁盘上），但是它们将为空。可以使用 --init-file 服务器启动选项通过查询重新填充它们。

trans-unit.source: Since the datatypes are pervasive in the stored routines, adapting a reference implementation to a different concept of 'address' would require multiple minor changes.
trans-unit.target: 由于数据类型在存储的例程中是普遍存在的,因此将参考实现调整为不同的 "地址 "概念将需要多次小的改动。

trans-unit.source: Since there are other types of queries besides DDL and DML, using the QUERY_DDL and QUERY_DML options together is not equivalent to using QUERY. Starting in version 1.3.0 of the Audit Plugin, there is the QUERY_DCL option for logging DCL types of queries (e.g., GRANT and REVOKE statements). In the same version, the server_audit_query_log_limit variable was added to be able to set the length of a log record. Previously, a log entry would be truncated due to long query strings.
trans-unit.target: 由于除了DDL和DML之外还有其他类型的查询， QUERY_DML 一起使用 QUERY_DDL 和QUERY_DML选项并不等同于使用 QUERY 。从1.3.0版的审计插件开始，有 QUERY_DCL 选项用于记录查询的DCL类型（例如 GRANT 和 REVOKE 语句）。在同一版本中，添加了server_audit_query_log_limit变量以能够设置日志记录的长度。以前，由于长查询字符串，日志条目将被截断。

trans-unit.source: Since this table records waits by table, always set to TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 由于此表记录按表等待，因此始终设置为 TABLE 。

trans-unit.source: Since truncation of a table does not make any use of DELETE, the TRUNCATE statement does not invoke ON DELETE triggers.
trans-unit.target: 由于表的截断不会使用 DELETE ，因此 TRUNCATE 语句不会调用 ON DELETE 触发器。

Replacing a string by an id (normalizing) saves many GB. This helps disk space and cacheability, hence speed.
trans-unit.target: 由于我们可能在谈论十亿行表，因此通过规范化来缩小Fact表的宽度（如此处所述）。将INT更改为MEDIUMINT将节省GB。用id替换字符串（规范化）可节省许多GB。这有助于磁盘空间和可缓存性，从而提高速度。

trans-unit.source: Slave has more GTIDs than the master has, using the master's SERVER_UUID. This may indicate that the end of the binary log was truncated or that the last binary log file was lost, e.g., after a power or disk failure when sync_binlog != 1. The master may or may not have rolled back transactions that were already replicated to the slave. Suggest to replicate any transactions that master has rolled back from slave to master, and/or commit empty transactions on master to account for transactions that have been committed on master but are not included in GTID_EXECUTED.
trans-unit.target: 从站的GTID比主站多,使用主站的SERVER_UUID。这可能表明二进制日志的结尾被截断了,或者最后一个二进制日志文件丢失了,例如,在电源或磁盘故障后,当sync_binlog !=1。主站可能或可能没有回滚已经复制到从站的事务。建议将主站已回滚的事务从从站复制到主站,和/或在主站上提交空事务,以说明已在主站上提交但未包含在GTID_EXECUTED中的事务。

trans-unit.source: So, the solution is to collect the names of the referred FUNCTIONs during parsing in the lex. Then, before doing anything else in mysql_execute_command(), read all functions from the database an keep them in the THD, where the function sp_find_function() can find them during the execution. Note: Even with an in-memory cache, we must still make sure that the functions are indeed read and cached at this point. The code that read and cache functions from the database must also be invoked recursively for each read FUNCTION to make sure we have *all* the functions we need.
trans-unit.target: 因此，解决方案是在lex解析期间收集引用的FUNCTION的名称。然后，在 mysql_execute_command() 中执行其他任何操作之前，请从数据库中读取所有函数，并将其保留在THD中，在此，函数 sp_find_function() 可以在执行期间找到它们。注意：即使使用内存缓存，我们仍然必须确保此时确实读取并缓存了函数。还必须为每个读取的FUNCTION递归调用从数据库读取和缓存功能的代码，以确保我们拥有所需的所有功能。

trans-unit.source: Some key management and encryption plugins allow you to automatically rotate and version your encryption keys. If a plugin support key rotation, and if it rotates the encryption keys, then InnoDB's background encryption threads can re-encrypt InnoDB pages that use the old key version with the new key version.
trans-unit.target: 一些密钥管理和加密插件可让您自动旋转和版本化加密密钥。如果插件支持密钥轮换，并且它旋转加密密钥，那么InnoDB的后台加密线程可以将使用旧密钥版本和新密钥版本的InnoDB页面重新加密。

trans-unit.source: Some key management and encryption plugins allow you to automatically rotate and version your encryption keys. If a plugin support key rotation, and if it rotates the encryption keys, then InnoDB's background encryption threads can re-encrypt InnoDB pages that use the old key version with the new key version. However, Aria does not have a similar mechanism, which means that the tables remain encrypted with the older key version. For more information, see MDEV-18971.
trans-unit.target: 一些密钥管理和加密插件可让您自动旋转和版本化加密密钥。如果插件支持密钥轮换，并且它旋转加密密钥，那么InnoDB的后台加密线程可以将使用旧密钥版本和新密钥版本的InnoDB页面重新加密。然而，晓月也不会有类似的机制，这意味着表保持与旧密钥版本加密。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-18971。

trans-unit.source: Some key management and encryption plugins allow you to automatically rotate and version your encryption keys. If a plugin support key rotation, and if it rotates the encryption keys, then InnoDB's background encryption threads can re-encrypt InnoDB pages that use the old key version with the new key version. However, the binary log does not have a similar mechanism, which means that existing binary logs remain encrypted with the older key version, but new binary logs will be encrypted with the new key version. For more information, see MDEV-20098.
trans-unit.target: 一些密钥管理和加密插件可让您自动旋转和版本化加密密钥。如果插件支持密钥轮换，并且它旋转加密密钥，那么InnoDB的后台加密线程可以将使用旧密钥版本和新密钥版本的InnoDB页面重新加密。但是，二进制日志也不会有类似的机制，这意味着现有的二进制日志仍然使用旧版本密钥加密的，但新的二进制日志会以新的密钥版本进行加密。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-20098。

trans-unit.source: Some math... If the index is small enough to be cached in RAM, each insert into the index is CPU only, with the writes being delayed and batched. If the index is 20 times as big as can be cached, then 19 out of 20 inserts will be a cache miss. (This math applies to any "random" index.)
trans-unit.target: 一些数学计算...如果索引足够小,可以缓存在RAM中,那么每次插入索引都是只用CPU,写入是延迟和分批的。如果索引是可以缓存的20倍大,那么20次插入中就有19次是缓存遗漏。这个数学适用于任何 "随机 "索引)。

trans-unit.source: Some views are updatable. That is, you can use them in statements such as UPDATE, DELETE, or INSERT to update the contents of the underlying table. For a view to be updatable, there must be a one-to-one relationship between the rows in the view and the rows in the underlying table. There are also certain other constructs that make a view non-updatable. See Inserting and Updating with Views.
trans-unit.target: 有些观点是可更新的。也就是说，您可以在诸如UPDATE，DELETE或INSERT之类的语句中使用它们来更新基础表的内容。为了使视图可更新，视图中的行与基础表中的行之间必须存在一对一的关系。还有某些其他构造使视图不可更新。请参见使用视图插入和更新。

trans-unit.source: Some window functions operate on window frames.
trans-unit.target: 一些窗口功能在窗口框架上操作。

trans-unit.source: Something goes wrong on the master (like a wrong update or delete) and you would like to revert to a state of the database (or just a table) at a certain point in time.
trans-unit.target: 主站出了问题(比如错误的更新或删除),你想恢复到数据库(或只是一张表)在某个时间点的状态。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes Unix socket authentication does not meet your needs, so it can be desirable to switch a user account back to password-based authentication. This can easily be done by telling MariaDB to use another authentication plugin for the account by executing the ALTER USER statement. The specific authentication plugin is specified with the IDENTIFIED VIA clause. For example, if you wanted to switch to the mysql_native_password authentication plugin, then you could execute:
trans-unit.target: 有时Unix套接字身份验证不能满足您的需求，因此可能需要将用户帐户切换回基于密码的身份验证。通过执行 ALTER USER 语句，告诉MariaDB 为该帐户使用另一个身份验证插件，可以轻松完成此操作。特定的身份验证插件通过 IDENTIFIED VIA 子句指定。例如，如果要切换到 mysql_native_password 身份验证插件，则可以执行：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a compression failure might happen, because the data has grown too much to fit the page. When this happens, the page (and the index node) is split into two different pages. This process can be repeated recursively until the data fit the pages. This can be CPU-consuming on some busy servers which perform many write operations.
trans-unit.target: 有时可能会发生压缩失败，因为数据增长得太大而无法容纳页面。发生这种情况时，页面（和索引节点）将分为两个不同的页面。可以递归地重复此过程，直到数据适合页面为止。在某些执行许多写操作的繁忙服务器上，这可能会占用大量CPU。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an error HANDLER just needs to SIGNAL the same error it received, optionally with some changes. Usually the RESIGNAL statement is the most convenient way to do this.
trans-unit.target: 有时，错误处理程序仅需要对收到的相同错误进行信号通知，可以选择进行一些更改。通常，RESIGNAL语句是最方便的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes failing to fetch the desired number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 有时无法获取所需的行数。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes issues like this can be fixed by updating the system's SELinux policies. You may be able to update the policies using audit2allow. See SELinux: Generating SELinux Policies with audit2allow for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有时，可以通过更新系统的SELinux策略来解决此类问题。您可能可以使用 audit2allow 更新策略。有关更多信息，请参见SELinux：使用audit2allow生成SELinux策略。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it can be helpful to add a suffix to the syslog tag, such as if you are running multiple instances of MariaDB on the same host. To add a suffix to each syslog tag, use the --syslog-tag option.
trans-unit.target: 有时，将后缀添加到syslog标记会很有帮助，例如，如果您在同一主机上运行MariaDB的多个实例。要将后缀添加到每个syslog标记，请使用 --syslog-tag 选项。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it can be helpful to perform a "manual SST" when Galera's normal SSTs fail. This can be especially useful when the cluster's datadir is very large, since a normal SST can take a long time to fail in that case.
trans-unit.target: 有时，当Galera的正常SST失败时执行“手动SST”会有所帮助。当群集的数据 datadir 很大时，这尤其有用，因为在这种情况下，正常的SST可能需要很长时间才能失败。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it can be helpful to permanently set SELinux to permissive mode or to permanently disable SELinux entirely. To do so, you have to update the SELinux configuration file. On many systems, it is at the following path:
trans-unit.target: 有时将SELinux永久设置为 permissive 模式或完全永久禁用SELinux 可能会有所帮助。为此，您必须更新SELinux配置文件。在许多系统上，它采用以下路径：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it can be useful to clear caches to allow understanding of uncached and cached query access. The calFlushCache() function will clear caches on all servers. This is only really useful for testing query performance:
trans-unit.target: 有时,清除缓存对了解未缓存和缓存查询的访问是很有用的。calFlushCache()函数将清除所有服务器上的缓存。这只对测试查询性能非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is also useful to see, which synchronization points have been run through (hit) with or without executing actions. Then add "|debug_sync_point:" to the egrep pattern.
trans-unit.target: 有时，查看哪些同步点已通过（命中）运行（执行或未执行操作）也很有用。然后将 "|debug_sync_point:" 添加到egrep模式。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is useful to change the port used by OpenLDAP. For example, some cloud environments block well-known authentication services, so they block the default LDAP port.
trans-unit.target: 有时,改变OpenLDAP使用的端口很有用。例如,一些云环境会阻止知名的身份验证服务,因此它们会阻止默认的LDAP端口。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it useful to understand the previous and next values in the context of a given row. The lag and lead window functions provide this capability. By default the offset is one providing the prior or next value but can also be provided to get a larger offset. The example query is a report of opportunities by account name showing the opportunity amount, and the prior and next opportunity amount for that account by close date.
trans-unit.target: 有时,了解给定行的上一个和下一个值是很有用的。滞后和前导窗口函数提供了这种功能。默认情况下,偏移量是一个提供上一个或下一个值的值,但也可以提供一个更大的偏移量。这个查询示例是一个按账户名显示的机会报告,其中显示了机会金额,以及按关闭日期显示的该账户的上一个和下一个机会金额。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the WHERE clause does not contain the necessary information to use partition pruning, or the optimizer cannot infer this information. However, we may know which partitions are relevant for the query. Since MariaDB 10.0, we can force MariaDB to only access the specified partitions by adding a PARTITION clause. This feature is called partition selection. For example:

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the scan can be avoided via a subquery. For example, the first of these will do a table scan; the second will not.
trans-unit.target: 有时可以通过子查询来避免扫描。例如,第一个子查询会进行表扫描,第二个不会。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes there is a requirement that when some data is deleted, it is really gone. This might be the case when one stores user's personal information or some other sensitive data. Normally though, when a row is deleted, the space is only marked as free on the page. It may eventually be overwritten, but there is no guarantee when that will happen. A copy of the deleted rows may also be present in the log files.
trans-unit.target: 有时候会有这样的要求,当一些数据被删除后,它就真的消失了。当一个人存储用户的个人信息或其他一些敏感数据时,可能就会出现这种情况。不过通常情况下,当一行被删除后,页面上的空间只是被标记为空闲。它最终可能会被覆盖,但不能保证何时会发生。被删除的行的副本也可能存在于日志文件中。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes we want to install a specific version of MariaDB, MariaDB Galera Cluster, or MaxScale on a certain system, but no packages are available. Or maybe, we simply want to isolate MariaDB from the rest of the system, to be sure that we won't cause any damage.
trans-unit.target: 有时我们想在特定系统上安装特定版本的MariaDB，MariaDB Galera Cluster或MaxScale，但是没有可用的软件包。或者也许，我们只是想将MariaDB与系统的其余部分隔离开，以确保我们不会造成任何损害。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you ended up with a full table scan -- Yuck.
trans-unit.target: 有时候,你最后会进行全表扫描--呸。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to work when your computer is busy running mysql-test-run.pl. The mysql-test-run.pl script allows you to stop it temporarily so you can use your computer and then restart the tests when you're ready.
trans-unit.target: 有时您需要在计算机忙于运行mysql-test-run.pl时进行工作。mysql-test-run.pl脚本允许您暂时将其停止，以便您可以使用计算机，然后在准备就绪时重新启动测试。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, changing a floating-point number from single-precision (FLOAT) to double-precision (DOUBLE) will fix the problem.

trans-unit.source: Sort index blocks. This speeds up 'read-next' in applications.

trans-unit.source: Sort records according to the given index (as specified by the index number). This makes your data much more localized and may speed up range-based SELECTs and ORDER BYs using this index. It may be VERY slow to do a sort the first time! To see the index numbers, SHOW INDEX displays table indexes in the same order that myisamchk sees them. The first index is 1.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的索引（由索引号指定）对记录进行排序。这使您的数据更加本地化，​​并可以使用此索引加快基于范围的SELECT和ORDER BY。第一次进行排序可能很慢！要查看索引号，SHOW INDEX以myisamchk看到它们的顺序显示表索引。第一个索引是1。

trans-unit.source: Sort the index tree blocks in high-low order. This optimizes seeks and makes table scans that use indexes faster.
trans-unit.target: 按高低顺序对索引树块进行排序。这样可以优化查找,使使用索引的表扫描速度更快。

trans-unit.source: Special care must be taken when specifying both the --plugin-load option and the --plugin-load-add option together. The --plugin-load option resets the plugin load list, and this can cause unexpected problems if you are not aware. The --plugin-load-add option does not reset the plugin load list, so it is much safer to use. See Specifying Multiple Plugin Load Options for more information.
trans-unit.target: 同时指定 --plugin-load 选项和 --plugin-load-add 选项时，必须格外小心。该 --plugin-load 选项会将插件加载列表，这可能会导致意想不到的问题，如果你不知道。该 --plugin-load-add 选项并不会重置插件加载列表，所以它是更安全的使用。有关更多信息，请参见指定多个插件加载选项。

trans-unit.source: Spider can benefit by 10% additional performance with Independent Storage Engine Statistics.

trans-unit.source: Spider deployments use data nodes to store the actual table data. In order for a MariaDB server to operate as a data node for Spider, you need to create a table or tables on which to store the data and configure the server to accept client connections from the Spider node.
trans-unit.target: Spider部署使用数据节点来存储实际的表数据。为了让MariaDB服务器作为Spider的数据节点来操作,你需要创建一个或多个表来存储数据,并配置服务器以接受来自Spider节点的客户端连接。

trans-unit.source: Spider differences between MySQL and MariaDB
trans-unit.target: MySQL和MariaDB的蜘蛛差异

trans-unit.source: Spider is a pluggable Storage Engine, acting as a proxy between the optimizer and the remote backends. When the optimizer requests multiple calls to the storage engine, Spider enforces consistency using the 2 phase commit protocol to the backends and by creating transactions on the backends to preserve atomic operations for a single SQL execution. Preserving atomic operation during execution is used at multiple levels in the architecture,. For the regular optimizer plan, it refers to multiple split reads and for concurrent partition scans, it will refer to semi transactions.
trans-unit.target: Spider是可插拔的存储引擎，充当优化器和远程后端之间的代理。当优化器请求对存储引擎的多次调用时，Spider通过对后端使用两阶段提交协议并在后端上创建事务来保持一致性，从而为单个SQL执行保留原子操作，从而增强了一致性。在执行过程中保留原子操作用于体系结构的多个级别。对于常规的优化程序计划，它指的是 multiple split reads ，对于并发分区扫描，它指的是 semi transactions 。
